participant_abstract.sent: Viewing of components costs and discussion.
Product evaluation based on new components and design.
Review of how meetings went and individuals contributions.

participant_decisions.sent: Single curved plastic remote, special colour, advanced chip for LCD and no speaker anymore due to cut in costs.

participant_problems.sent: Problems with the costs. had to resort to plastic case and single curved, therefor not comfortable and stylish in the hand and also not sleek design.
No speakers allowed to locate a lost remote due to costs.
